ygData.subject: Re: Any price recommendations?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm i do it all time free until im low on time or it reguest much time to recover mana. Food and dring is one thing wich a magicion or cleric will alwas do for
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm i do it all time free until im low on time or it reguest much time to
recover mana. Food and dring is one thing wich a magicion or cleric will
alwas do for his group normaly its a free service for group members.

Food and dring are realy relative if you wish to pay for things wich will
vanish if you lost or close connection i suggest for this a ?

half price of normal ration is 1 to 1.5 silver
half price of milk bottle is 4 - 5 copper
Bind goes from a 5 gold to 1 plat.
summoned bag i suggest for 1 gold it is nice as your loot dont have any
weight but risky
bandages half price a real one
summoned weapons i think you cannot give to others with last fixes wich are
introduced to spell sistem only to pets.



At 13.38 30/04/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: Matthew Musingo <vmjh@...>
>
>Many unelightened warriors have walked up to me and asked to be
>binded/SOWed/get some food and water/invisible. Now, my question is...what
>is your recommendation as setting the price on these spells?
>
>Oh, and on Fennin Ro, I love the guy in Qeynos who kept saying he was
>insane and PAYING people to bind them. Forgot his name.
>
>Kapolokok
>
